name: Behavioral Health Services (LGBTQ)
description: UCSF Alliance Health Project provides lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer (LGBTQ) and individuals living with HIV following mental health services: - Case management - Gender health support - Group therapy sessions - Psychotherapy - Substance use counseling
fullDescription: UCSF Alliance Health Project provides lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer (LGBTQ) and individuals living with HIV following mental health services: - Case management - Gender health support - Group therapy sessions - Psychotherapy - Substance use counseling
whatTheyOffer: UCSF Alliance Health Project provides lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer (LGBTQ) and individuals living with HIV following mental health services: - Case management - Gender health support - Group therapy sessions - Psychotherapy - Substance use counseling
requirements: AHP provides mental health crisis or psychiatric assessment and medication management to people who are lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, or queer (LGBTQ) identified or wish to receive services in an LGBTQ-affirmative clinic.
